text: James Bolesworth Bradwell (April 16, 1828 - November 30, 1907) was an American lawyer, judge, and a representative from Illinois. Bradwell was born April 16, 1828, at Loughborough, England to American parents. He was raised in Utica, New York and in Jacksonville, Illinois. In 1852, he married Myra Colby. They had four children. Bradwell died on November 30, 1907 in Chicago, Illinois from pneumonia, aged 79. ==Other websites== * Biography on rootsweb * Transactions of the Illinois State Historical Society for the Year 1908, pp. 329-330. title: James B. Bradwell
